name: Red Willow
description: "Have a very scary holiday!" - Red Willow

heroPerk.name: Holiday Surprise
heroPerk.description: At the end of <HeroAbility>Phase Shift</> trigger an explosion, dealing <Number>40</> base <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> damage in a <Number>384</> tile radius.

commanderPerk.name: Holiday Surprise +
commanderPerk.description: At the end of <HeroAbility>Phase Shift</> trigger an explosion, dealing <Number>40</> base <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> damage in a <Number>384</> tile radius. <HeroAbility>Phase Shift</> has a <Number>[Ability.Line4]%</> chance to conjure a <ModifiedAttribute>Phantasm</> (targets a nearby enemy, dealing <Number>[Ability.Line5]</> base <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> damage in a <Number>0.5</> tile radius, <Number>[Ability.Line6]</> second cooldown).

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Quickly dash through space, gaining [Ability.Line2]% increased movement speed for [Ability.Line3] seconds.

abilities.name: Seismic Smash
abilities.description: Smash the ground, creating a fissure of energy which deals [Damage.Value] energy damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Shock Tower
abilities.description: Deploy a device which shocks nearby enemies, stunning them and dealing [Damage] base damage.
